\subsection{Main Module}
\label{\detokenize{main:main-module}}\label{\detokenize{main::doc}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
This module initializes and starts the game.
\index{module@\spxentry{module}!main@\spxentry{main}}\index{main@\spxentry{main}!module@\spxentry{module}}\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{main:module-main}}

\subsection{Core Module}
\label{\detokenize{core:module-core.game_of_life}}\label{\detokenize{core:core-module}}\label{\detokenize{core::doc}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!core.game\_of\_life@\spxentry{core.game\_of\_life}}\index{core.game\_of\_life@\spxentry{core.game\_of\_life}!module@\spxentry{module}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Game of Life Logic Module

\sphinxAtStartPar
This module defines the core logic for customizable version of Conway’s Game of Life.
It provides grid state management and rules for updating generations.

\sphinxAtStartPar
Author: Shehabeldin Mohamed
Version: 1.0
\index{GameOfLife (class in core.game\_of\_life)@\spxentry{GameOfLife}\spxextra{class in core.game\_of\_life}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{core:core.game_of_life.GameOfLife}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{\DUrole{k}{class}\DUrole{w}{ }}}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{core.game\_of\_life.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{GameOfLife}}}
{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{width}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{int}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{height}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{int}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{wrap}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{bool}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{default_value}{False}}}
{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{object}}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Supports wraparound edges and configurable rules as follows:
A live cell survives if alive neighbors are within under/overpopulation limits.
A dead cell becomes alive if it has exactly \sphinxtitleref{custom\_reproduction\_number} neighbors.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Parameters}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{width}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} Width of the grid in cells.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{height}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} Height of the grid in cells.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{wrap}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}) \textendash{} Whether the grid wraps around the edges.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
\index{clear() (core.game\_of\_life.GameOfLife method)@\spxentry{clear()}\spxextra{core.game\_of\_life.GameOfLife method}}

\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{clear}}}
{}
{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Reset the grid to all dead cells and reset generation count.

\end{fulllineitems}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{core:core.game_of_life.GameOfLife.count_alive_neighbors}}
\pysigstartsignatures

{{ $\rightarrow$ int}}
\pysigstopsignatures

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar

\end{itemize}

\sphinxlineitem{Returns}
\sphinxAtStartPar
(int) Number of alive neighboring cells.

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{set\_custom\_rules() (core.game\_of\_life.GameOfLife method)@\spxentry{set\_custom\_rules()}\spxextra{core.game\_of\_life.GameOfLife method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{core:core.game_of_life.GameOfLife.set_custom_rules}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{set\_custom\_rules}}}
{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{overpop}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{int}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{underpop}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{int}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{repro}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{int}}}
{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Set custom rules for cell survival and reproduction.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Parameters}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{overpop}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} Maximum neighbors before a cell dies from overpopulation.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{underpop}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} Minimum neighbors for a live cell to survive.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{repro}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} Exact number of neighbors required for a dead cell to reproduce.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\subsection{GUI Module}
\label{\detokenize{gui:module-gui.game_gui}}\label{\detokenize{gui:gui-module}}\label{\detokenize{gui::doc}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!gui.game\_gui@\spxentry{gui.game\_gui}}\index{gui.game\_gui@\spxentry{gui.game\_gui}!module@\spxentry{module}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Game of Life GUI using PyQt5

\sphinxAtStartPar
This module provides a zoomable, pannable, interactive GUI for Conway’s Game of Life,
based on a GameOfLife class with methods like \sphinxtitleref{toggle\_cell(x, y)}, \sphinxtitleref{next\_generation()}, and \sphinxtitleref{clear()}.

\sphinxAtStartPar
Author: Darya Sharnevich
Version: 1.0
\index{GameOfLifeGUI (class in gui.game\_gui)@\spxentry{GameOfLifeGUI}\spxextra{class in gui.game\_gui}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{gui:gui.game_gui.GameOfLifeGUI}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{\DUrole{k}{class}\DUrole{w}{ }}}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{gui.game\_gui.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{GameOfLifeGUI}}}
{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{width}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{50}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{height}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{50}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{wrap}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{False}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{menu\_window}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{None}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{speed}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{10}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{fixed\_view}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{False}}}
{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{QWidget}}

\sphinxAtStartPar
A PyQt5 widget for displaying and interacting with the Game of Life.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Parameters}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{width}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} Width of the grid in cells.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{height}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} Height of the grid in cells.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{wrap}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}) \textendash{} Enable grid wrapping behavior.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{menu\_window}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{QWidget}}) \textendash{} Optional reference to main menu window.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{speed}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} Initial simulation speed (generations per second).

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{fixed\_view}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}) \textendash{} Whether to disable zoom/pan and scale grid to fit.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
